name: Studio Center
tagline: Content Creation, Video, Audio, Websites, Media
description:
Studio Center, a nationally acclaimed & award-winning firm specializing in content creation, distribution & measurement, is renowned both for its high-end work & unmatched customer service.
Studio Center has 8 divisions: Video, Audio, Web Design & Development, Talent, Media Strategy & Fulfillment, The Studio Center Network, & Studio Center Entertainment. Our work consists of video production, audio production, websites, social media management, web videos, radio & TV commercials, training videos, sound design, voice overs, media buys, 2D & 3D motion graphics, animation, & foreign translations.
Studio Center has studios in Virginia Beach, Washington, DC, New York City, & Richmond, with over 700 full & part time employees contracted to us.
We handle all video production from “script to screen” including all aspects of pre-production, crewing, & post production. Our video post crew is proficient in editing, motion graphics, color grading, and color correction.
Studio Center has 16 fully outfitted audio rooms. We produce 1000's of radio spots, voiceovers, video mixes & foreign translations annually, including over 100 award winning jingles & music beds.
Studio Center has over 300 Voice Over Actors & 500 On Camera Actors on our Talent Roster.
We design and develop custom, state-of-the-art websites, static digital content for paid ads, & print media. We offer free hosting & maintenance to all of our customers. Our copywriters write for websites, short-form ads, blogs, press releases, & other media outlets. Studio Center Media has placed millions in both digital & traditional media over the past 10 years and works in concert with our Social Media Division.Please contact us at 866-515-2111 to start your project and to find out more.
